full_translation:
**The Supreme Lingbao Jade Canon’s Rites of Illuminating Perfection and Repentance**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Lingbao Jade Canon’s Rites of Illuminating Perfection and Repentance*. One fascicle.

**Revised by Du Guangting of the Late Tang and Five Dynasties Period**
**Source:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Dongxuan Section*, *Weiyi* (威仪) Category.

---

**The Supreme Lingbao Jade Canon’s Rites of Illuminating Perfection and Repentance**
**Compiled by Du Guangting, Master of Broad Achievement**

**General Repentance**
We, your disciples and assembly, with utmost sincerity, take refuge in the Ten Directions’ Boundless Supreme Lingbao Heavenly Worthy, the Ten Polar Heavenly Lords, the Great Perfected Saints who have attained the Dao, the Most Real Lords and Sages, and the Divine Officials of the Ten Realms.

We bow in reverence and offer repentance.

**Confession**
We have heard that the Primal Honored One spreads transformation, opening the Ten Poles to oversee humanity; the Great Saints proclaim compassion, gazing upon the Eight Gates to relieve suffering. Thus, the most wise inquire into the categories of karmic conditions, while the Flying Immortals present the statutes of response and retribution. Since the texts of sin and blessing are made manifest, the principles of repentance and prayer are thereby established. We await the bestowal of supreme blessings to deliver those in the dark prisons.

We now reverently follow the sacred decree, strictly adhering to the ritual protocols. We prepare offerings of faith: silk brocades from the Ten Directions, incense, flowers, oil, and candles. On behalf of [Name], we perform the *Nine Dark Realms Jade Canon’s Illuminating Perfection Grand Fast* for [X] days and nights. We unfurl the Nine Radiant Mystic Tassels and invoke the Eight Assemblies’ True Scriptures. We take refuge in the Ten Directions’ Boundless Supreme Lingbao Heavenly Worthy, the Ten Polar Heavenly Lords, and the Divine Officials of the Ten Realms.

We repent for [Name]’s transgressions and errors, boundless and immeasurable, from kalpas past to this very day. Through this fast and repentance, we beseech their complete eradication. May the soul be refined in the Vermilion Mound, the spirit polished in the Cinnabar Palace. Ascend to the Palace of Mystic Yang, mount the Court of the Great Ultimate. Serve the August Sovereign in splendor, eternally attain the ranks of the Perfected. Join the lineage of the Primordial Sages, honor the sacred spirits of state and earth.

Clad in robes of rosy clouds and caps of celestial jade, wander the domains of Lesser Breadth and Supreme Tenuity. May the imperial destiny flourish, the dynastic foundation endure. May the Emperor’s glory equal the sun and moon, his years match Mount Song and Mount Heng. May the Six Palaces and Vermilion Gates, the Crown Prince and the myriad princes, ever tread the courts of fortune, eternally receive Heaven’s blessings. May the ministers and officials, the countless common people, together ascend the realm of benevolence and longevity, achieve the transformation of grand peace.

May the living glow with harmony, the Five Qi balance in equilibrium. May all beings, seen and unseen, together ascend the realm of blessings. After attaining the Dao, ascend into formlessness, unite with the Dao in truth.

---

**East**
We, your disciples and assembly, now burn incense, dedicating body, spirit, and life. Reverently following the sacred decree, we perform the *Jade Canon’s Nine Dark Realms Illuminating Perfection Ritual*, burning incense and circumambulating the Dao. We repent for [Name]’s transgressions and errors, boundless and immeasurable, from kalpas past to this very day.

In accordance with the *Upper Palace of the Female Azure*, we offer one bolt of azure-patterned silk, taking refuge in the East’s Boundless Supreme Lingbao Heavenly Worthy, the Great Perfected Saints who have attained the Dao, the Most Real Lords and Sages, and the Divine Officials of the Eastern Realm. Deliver [Name] from the roots of kalpic sins. May the Three Realms’ Registrars of Karma, the *Upper Palace of the Female Azure*, erase the records of transgressions and open the gates of the dark prisons. May the body enter radiance, ascend to the heavens, attain the fruits of the Dao, and forever join the ranks of the Perfected Immortals.

May the sacred charts endure, celestial longevity stretch afar. May the myriad lands share in blessings, the Four Seas know grand peace. After attaining the Dao, ascend into formlessness, unite with the Dao in truth.

---

**South**
We, your disciples and assembly, now burn incense, dedicating body, spirit, and life. Reverently following the sacred decree, we perform the *Jade Canon’s Nine Dark Realms Illuminating Perfection Ritual*, burning incense and circumambulating the Dao. We repent for [Name]’s transgressions and errors, boundless and immeasurable, from kalpas past to this very day.

In accordance with the *Yang Palace of the Female Azure*, we offer one bolt of crimson-patterned silk, taking refuge in the South’s Boundless Supreme Lingbao Heavenly Worthy, the Great Perfected Saints who have attained the Dao, the Most Real Lords and Sages, and the Divine Officials of the Southern Realm. Deliver [Name] from the roots of kalpic sins. May the Three Realms’ Registrars of Karma, the *Yang Palace of the Female Azure*, erase the records of transgressions and open the gates of the dark prisons. May the body enter radiance, ascend to the heavens, refine the spirit in the Cinnabar Palace, and verify the ranks of the Vermilion Palace.

May the Emperor’s years be myriad, his reign endure. May the Four Seas be pacified, the world know grand peace. After attaining the Dao, ascend into formlessness, unite with the Dao in truth.

---

**West**
We, your disciples and assembly, now burn incense, dedicating body, spirit, and life. Reverently following the sacred decree, we perform the *Jade Canon’s Nine Dark Realms Illuminating Perfection Ritual*, burning incense and circumambulating the Dao. We repent for [Name]’s transgressions and errors, boundless and immeasurable, from kalpas past to this very day.

In accordance with the *Right Palace of the Female Azure and the Dark Officials*, we offer one bolt of white-patterned silk, taking refuge in the West’s Boundless Supreme Lingbao Heavenly Worthy, the Great Perfected Saints who have attained the Dao, the Most Real Lords and Sages, and the Divine Officials of the Western Realm. Deliver [Name] from the roots of kalpic sins. May the Three Realms’ Registrars of Karma, the *Right Palace of the Female Azure and the Dark Officials*, erase the records of transgressions and open the gates of the dark prisons. May the body enter radiance, ascend to the heavens.

Mount the Western Lingbao Tower, gaze upon the Jade Palace. May the Dragon Charts extend forever, the sacred lifespan know no bounds. May the myriad lands receive blessings, the seen and unseen be graced with favor. After attaining the Dao, ascend into formlessness, unite with the Dao in truth.

---

**North**
We, your disciples and assembly, now burn incense, dedicating body, spirit, and life. Reverently following the sacred decree, we perform the *Jade Canon’s Nine Dark Realms Illuminating Perfection Ritual*, burning incense and circumambulating the Dao. We repent for [Name]’s transgressions and errors, boundless and immeasurable, from kalpas past to this very day.

In accordance with the *Great Yang Palace and the Fire Officials of the Female Azure*, we offer one bolt of black-patterned silk, taking refuge in the North’s Boundless Supreme Lingbao Heavenly Worthy, the Great Perfected Saints who have attained the Dao, the Most Real Lords and Sages, and the Divine Officials of the Northern Realm.

We deliver [Name] from the karmic roots of sins accumulated over countless kalpas. The Three Realms’ Registrars of Karma, the Fire Officials of the Female Azure’s Great Yang Palace, erase the records of transgressions and open the gates of the Dark Realms. The body enters radiance and ascends into Heavenly Paradise. Bathed in the jade pool’s essence, it ascends to the golden palaces. May the nation’s fortune stretch far, and the sage’s longevity extend boundlessly. May all directions submit to transformation, and great harmony pervade universally. After attaining the Dao, ascend into formlessness, unite with the Dao in truth.

**Northeast**
We, your disciples and assembly, now burn incense, dedicating body, spirit, and life. Reverently following the sacred decree, we perform the *Jade Canon’s Nine Dark Realms Illuminating Perfection Ritual*, burning incense and circumambulating the Dao. We repent for [Name]’s transgressions and errors, boundless and immeasurable, from kalpas past to this very day.

In accordance with the Female Azure’s Left Palace Prohibition Officials, we offer one bolt of yellow-patterned silk, taking refuge in the Northeast’s Boundless Supreme Lingbao Heavenly Worthy, the Great Perfected Saints who have attained the Dao, the Most Real Lords and Sages, and the Divine Officials of the Northeastern Realm.

We deliver [Name] from the karmic roots of sins accumulated over countless kalpas. The Three Realms’ Registrars of Karma, the Female Azure’s Left Palace Prohibition Officials, erase the records of transgressions and open the gates of the Dark Realms. The body enters radiance and ascends into Heavenly Paradise. Forever attaining the ranks of the Perfected, it roams and feasts in the Nine Heavens of Purity. May blessings flow to the sage’s throne, and the emperor’s life extend eternally. May the Nine Provinces be united, and writing and chariot-tracks share a common script. After attaining the Dao, ascend into formlessness, unite with the Dao in truth.

**Southeast**
We, your disciples and assembly, now burn incense, dedicating body, spirit, and life. Reverently following the sacred decree, we perform the *Jade Canon’s Nine Dark Realms Illuminating Perfection Ritual*, burning incense and circumambulating the Dao. We repent for [Name]’s transgressions and errors, boundless and immeasurable, from kalpas past to this very day.

In accordance with the Female Azure’s Central Palace, we offer one bolt of yellow-patterned silk, taking refuge in the Southeast’s Boundless Supreme Lingbao Heavenly Worthy, the Great Perfected Saints who have attained the Dao, the Most Real Lords and Sages, and the Divine Officials of the Southeastern Realm.

We deliver [Name] from the karmic roots of sins accumulated over countless kalpas. The Three Realms’ Registrars of Karma, the Female Azure’s Central Palace, erase the records of transgressions and open the gates of the Dark Realms. The body enters radiance and ascends into Heavenly Paradise. Roaming the domains of stone palaces and bronze stairways, it ascends to the Palace of the Sun’s Chariot. May blessings sustain the illustrious destiny, and the sage’s longevity extend. May the Three Luminaries shine brightly, and the myriad nations know peace. After attaining the Dao, ascend into formlessness, unite with the Dao in truth.

**Southwest**
We, your disciples and assembly, now burn incense, dedicating body, spirit, and life. Reverently following the sacred decree, we perform the *Jade Canon’s Nine Dark Realms Illuminating Perfection Ritual*, burning incense and circumambulating the Dao. We repent for [Name]’s transgressions and errors, boundless and immeasurable, from kalpas past to this very day.

In accordance with the Female Azure’s Lower Palace Right Officials, we offer one bolt of yellow-patterned silk, taking refuge in the Southwest’s Boundless Supreme Lingbao Heavenly Worthy, the Great Perfected Saints who have attained the Dao, the Most Real Lords and Sages, and the Divine Officials of the Southwestern Realm.

We deliver [Name] from the karmic roots of sins accumulated over countless kalpas. The Three Realms’ Registrars of Karma, the Female Azure’s Lower Palace Right Officials, erase the records of transgressions and open the gates of the Dark Realms. The body enters radiance and ascends into Heavenly Paradise, forever attaining the fruits of the Perfected and roaming the Nine Heavens of Purity. May the great treasure of prosperity extend, and the sage’s longevity stretch far. May Heaven and Earth be serene, and the myriad nations know great peace. After attaining the Dao, ascend into formlessness, unite with the Dao in truth.

**Northwest**
We, your disciples and assembly, now burn incense, dedicating body, spirit, and life. Reverently following the sacred decree, we perform the *Jade Canon’s Nine Dark Realms Illuminating Perfection Ritual*, burning incense and circumambulating the Dao. We repent for [Name]’s transgressions and errors, boundless and immeasurable, from kalpas past to this very day.

In accordance with the Female Azure’s Great Yin Palace Water Officials, we offer one bolt of yellow-patterned silk, taking refuge in the Northwest’s Boundless Supreme Lingbao Heavenly Worthy, the Great Perfected Saints who have attained the Dao, the Most Real Lords and Sages, and the Divine Officials of the Northwestern Realm.

We deliver [Name] from the karmic roots of sins accumulated over countless kalpas. The Three Realms’ Registrars of Karma, the Female Azure’s Great Yin Palace Water Officials, erase the records of transgressions and open the gates of the Dark Realms. The body enters radiance and ascends into Heavenly Paradise, transcending to the ranks of the Perfected and serving in splendor beside the Jade Dawn. May blessings flow to the imperial lineage, and the sage’s longevity stretch far. May all under Heaven receive blessings, and the myriad nations know tranquility. After attaining the Dao, ascend into formlessness, unite with the Dao in truth.

**Above**
We, your disciples and assembly, now burn incense, dedicating body, spirit, and life. Reverently following the sacred decree, we perform the *Jade Canon’s Nine Dark Realms Illuminating Perfection Ritual*, burning incense and circumambulating the Dao. We repent for [Name]’s transgressions and errors, boundless and immeasurable, from kalpas past to this very day.

In accordance with the Female Azure’s Upper Palace Chief Prohibition Officials, we offer one bolt of azure-patterned silk, taking refuge in the Above’s Boundless Supreme Lingbao Heavenly Worthy, the Great Perfected Saints who have attained the Dao, the Most Real Lords and Sages, the Heavenly Thearchs of the Sun, Moon, and Stars, and the Divine Officials of the Upper Realm in the Boundless World.

We deliver [Name] from the karmic roots of sins accumulated over countless kalpas. The Three Realms’ Registrars of Karma, the Female Azure’s Upper Palace Chief Prohibition Officials, erase the records of transgressions. The body enters radiance and ascends into Heavenly Paradise. Adorned with cloud-tassels and feathered pendants, it verifies its rank and ascends to the Perfected. Soaring beyond the Three Realms, it roams freely in the Upper Purity. The Two Modes shine in harmony, and the Three Radiant Ones gleam brightly. Winds and clouds follow their proper order, and the six qi are without flaw. May the nation’s fortune flourish eternally, and the sage’s longevity extend. May all under Heaven and within the four seas bathe in the mysterious power. After attaining the Dao, ascend into formlessness, unite with the Dao in truth.

**Below**
We, your disciples and assembly, now burn incense, dedicating body, spirit, and life. Reverently following the sacred decree, we perform the *Jade Canon’s Nine Dark Realms Illuminating Perfection Ritual*, burning incense and circumambulating the Dao.

We now repent and offer gratitude for the boundless errors and transgressions committed from kalpas immeasurable until this day. Reverently following the Four Bureau Officials of the Lower Palace of Lady Blue, we present a bolt of azure-patterned silk, dedicating our lives to the Most High, Limitless, Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy, the Great Sage Assemblies who have attained the Dao, the Perfected Lords and Venerable Worthies, the August Sovereigns of the Nine Lands, the Five Emperors of the Four Bureaus, the Twelve Immortal Lords, the Perfected of the Nine Palaces, the divine officials of the sacred mountains, grotto-heavens, and riverine peaks.

May they deliver and release the karmic roots of our sins from kalpas past. May the Three Realms’ Registrars and the Four Bureau Officials of the Lower Palace of Lady Blue expunge our records of transgression and open the gates of the Dark Realms. May our bodies radiate light and ascend into the Courts of Blessing. Roaming freely in the Golden Towers, we feast and wander through the heavens. May the imperial enterprise flourish and the sage’s longevity know no end. May mountains and rivers stand firm, seas and peaks be at peace. May the myriad states return to transformation, and all under Heaven know great tranquility. After attaining the Dao, we ascend into formlessness and unite with the Dao in truth.

The *Luminous Perfection Retreat of the Numinous Treasure Jade Canon’s Repentance Rites* is now complete.

chunks.original_text: 上灵宝玉匮明真斋忏方仪 经名：太上灵宝玉匮明真斋忏方仪。 一卷。 唐末五代杜光庭修心底本出处：《正统道藏》洞玄部威仪类。 太上灵宝玉匮明真斋忏方仪 广成先生杜光庭修 都忏 臣众等至心归命，十方无极太上灵宝天尊，十极天君，已得道大圣众，至真诸君圣人，十乡神仙诸灵官。 礼足。 各虔诚忏谢。 忏悔 臣等伏闻，元尊布化，开十极以临人； 大圣宣慈，观八门而济苦。 由是上智问因缘之品，飞天陈报对之科。 既彰罪福之文，遂着忏祈之旨。 伫弘胜福，以拯幽关。 臣今钦奉圣旨，谨依科式，赍备信仪，十方纹缯，香花油烛。 奉为某修九幽玉匮明真大斋，几日夜。 披九光玄组，请八会真文。 归命十方无极太上灵宝天尊，十极天君，十乡神仙诸灵官。 忏悔某亿劫以来，至于今日，有诸故误，无量无边。 以今立斋忏谢，并乞荡除。 伏冀炼魄朱陵，莹神丹霍。 升洞阳之府，登太极之庭。 景侍虚皇，永阶真品，宗桃先圣，社稷尊灵。 备霞裳云冕之仪，游少广太微之域。 克昌洪祚，以固皇基。 皇帝日月齐华，嵩衡等寿。 六宫丹禁，太子诸王。 常履福庭，永承天禄。 公卿臣佐。 亿兆黎元。 俱跻仁寿之乡，克致升平之化。 生光调理，五气均和。 动植幽明，同登福界。 得道之后，升入无形，与道合真。 东方 臣众等今故烧香，归身归神归命，钦奉圣旨，依玉匮九幽明真科品，修拔度大斋，烧香行道。 忏谢某亿劫以来，至于今日，所行故误，无量无边。 谨依女青上宫，赍青纹之缯一疋，归命东方无极太上灵宝天尊，已得道大圣众，至真诸君圣人，东乡神仙诸灵官。 拔度某亿劫罪根。 三界司算，女青上宫，削除罪录，开度幽关。 身入光明，上升天堂，跻登道果，永列真仙。 圣图悠久，天寿遐长。 万方同福，四海太平。 得道之后，升入无形，与道合真。 南方 臣众等今故烧香，归身归神归命，钦奉圣旨，依玉匮九幽明真科品，修拔度大斋，烧香行道。 忏谢某亿劫以来，至于今日，所行故误，无量无边。 谨依女青阳宫，赍绛纹之缯一疋，归命南方无极太上灵宝天尊，已得道大圣众，至真诸君圣人，南乡神仙诸灵官。 拔度某亿劫罪根。 三界司算，女青阳宫，削除罪录，开度幽关。 身入光明，上升天堂，炼神丹霍，证品朱宫。 帝王万寿，祚历遐长，四海安镇，普天太平。 得道之后，升入无形，与道合真。 西方 臣众等今故烧香，归身归神归命，钦奉圣旨，依玉匮九幽明真科品，修拔度大斋，烧香行道。 忏谢某亿劫以来，至于今日，所行故误，无量无边。 谨依女青右宫阴官，赍白纹之缯一疋，归命西方无极太上灵宝天尊，已得道大圣众，至真诸君圣人，西乡神仙诸灵官。 拔度某亿劫罪根。 三界司等，女青右宫，阴官，削除罪录，开度幽关。 身入光明，上升天堂。 登西灵宝阙，郁察琼宫。 龙图延永，圣寿无疆。 万方受福，幽显蒙恩。 得道之后，升入无形，与道合真。 北方 臣众等今故烧香，归身归神归命，钦奉圣旨，依玉匮九幽明真科品，修拔度大斋，烧香行道。 忏谢某亿劫以来，至于今日，所行故误，无量无边。 谨依女青太阳宫火官，赍玄纹之缯一疋，归命北方无极太上灵宝天尊，已得道大圣众，至真诸君圣人，北乡神仙诸灵官。
